title: Taiwan-U.S. Innovation Link Strengthened: Startup Island TAIWAN Partners with the City of Phoenix to Deepen Cross-Border Collaboration in AI, Semiconductors, and Health Tech Startups
description: TAIPEI, Jan. 16, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- To accelerate the co-development of Taiwan-U.S. startup ecosystems in artificial intelligence (AI), semiconductors, and advanced technologies, Startup Island TAIWAN, the national startup brand guided by Taiwan's National Development Council (NDC), today announced the signing of a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with the City of Phoenix, the Greater Phoenix Economic Council (GPEC), and Tesoro Venture Capital, in collaboration with the Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI).
content: TAIPEI, Jan. 16, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- To accelerate the co-development of Taiwan-U.S. startup ecosystems in artificial intelligence (AI), semiconductors, and advanced technologies, Startup Island TAIWAN, the national startup brand guided by Taiwan's ... [6550 chars]

title: TSMC forecasts nearly 30% sales growth in 2026, plans capex expansion amid AI demand
description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. (TSMC) projects its sales to grow by nearly 30 per cent in 2026, driven by robust demand for artificial intelligence (AI) and a recovery in non-AI applications. The company also plans to expand its capital expenditure by as much as 37 per cent to accommodate client requirements, according to a report by Focus Taiwan.
content: New Delhi [India], January 16 (ANI): Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. (TSMC) projects its sales to grow by nearly 30 per cent in 2026, driven by robust demand for artificial intelligence (AI) and a recovery in non-AI applications. The company a... [2334 chars]

title: Taiwan Seeks Strong AI Partnership with U.S. through Major Investment Deal
description: Taiwan aims to forge a strategic partnership with the U.S. in artificial intelligence by cutting tariffs and boosting its investment in the U.S., as per Vice Premier Cheng Li-chiun. A new deal will see Taiwanese firms invest $250 billion in the U.S., focusing on semiconductors, energy, and AI.
content: Taiwan is aiming to establish a strong strategic partnership with the United States in the realm of artificial intelligence. This follows the signing of a significant trade deal intended to cut tariffs and bolster Taiwanese investment in America, acc... [682 chars]

title: Yen in Focus as Global Markets Eye Tokyo's Moves
description: Global markets were poised for a positive close on the week as artificial intelligence trading gains momentum. The spotlight is on the yen, with Japan's Finance Minister hinting at possible intervention. Elsewhere, oil and precious metals are reacting to geopolitical tensions, while the U.S. dollar remains robust.

title: Trump administration imposes 25% tariff on certain advanced AI Chips
description: President Donald Trump announced a new 25% tariff on certain advanced artificial intelligence semiconductors.
content:
President Donald Trump announced a new 25% tariff on certain advanced artificial intelligence semiconductors, escalating U.S. trade measures aimed at bolstering domestic chip manufacturing and addressing national security concerns.
